name: Commonwealth at Suggestion of Ruggles et al., Appellants, v. American Surety Company of New York

judges: Before Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth at Suggestion of Ruggles et al., Appellants, v. American Surety Company of New York.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
A majority of the judges of this court agree with both the reasoning and the judgment of the Superior Court in this case, as appears in 112 Pa. Superior Ct. 270.
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: J. P. Vallilee, of Schrier & Vallilee, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth at Suggestion of Ruggles et al., Appellants, v. American Surety Company of New York.
Argued May 1, 1934.
Before Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
May 21, 1934:
J. P. Vallilee, of Schrier & Vallilee, for appellants.
Paul G. Collins, for appellee.
